data.lyric:
[ti:Undrunk (Explicit)]
[ar:FLETCHER]
[al:Undrunk (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Undrunk (Explicit) - FLETCHER
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：Cari Fletcher/Amy Allen/Tim Sommers/Jeremy Dussolliet/James Ho
[00:00.23]Composed by：Cari Fletcher/Amy Allen/Tim Sommers/Jeremy Dussolliet/James Ho
[00:00.35]Produced by：Malay
[00:00.46]Wish I could get a little undrunk
[00:02.28]So I could uncall you
[00:04.03]At 5 in the morning I would unf**k you
[00:09.52]Honestly this party's over
[00:11.76]Everyone here should've gone home
[00:14.32]But I'm afraid of being sober
[00:16.58]'Cause the first thing I do when I'm alone
[00:19.16]I start touching myself to the photos
[00:21.48]That you used to send me
[00:22.58]I should've deleted but kept it a secret
[00:26.26]Is that crazy to do
[00:29.56]So I squeeze out the lime on the ice of my drink
[00:32.12]And the juice hits the cuts on my fingers
[00:34.09]It still doesn't burn as much as the thought of you
[00:39.43]Wish I could get a little undrunk so I could uncall you
[00:42.75]At 5 in the morning I would unf**k you
[00:46.16]But some things you can't undo
[00:49.93]I wish I could unkiss the room full of strangers
[00:53.01]So I could unspite you unlose my temper
[00:56.48]But somethings you can't undo
[01:00.17]And one of them's you
[01:03.14]I'm afraid to turn the lights on
[01:05.96]I don't want to face this rebound
[01:08.57]Is it weird if I come over
[01:11.06]I want to but I know that she's around
[01:13.53]So I'm touching myself to the photos
[01:15.62]That you used to send me
[01:16.85]I should have deleted but kept it a secret
[01:20.51]Is that crazy to do
[01:23.64]Oh I'm hungry and wasted and my hands are shaking
[01:26.41]I shouldn't be cooking but spilling hot water
[01:29.19]It still doesn't burn as much as the thought of you
[01:33.59]Wish I could get a little undrunk so I could uncall you
[01:36.95]At 5 in the morning I would unf**k you
[01:40.30]But some things you can't undo
[01:44.00]I wish I could unkiss the room full of strangers
[01:47.22]So I could unspite you unlose my temper
[01:50.67]But somethings you can't undo
[01:54.37]And one of them's you
[01:55.58]Got through every emotion
[01:57.78]Right now I'm sad I'm broken
[02:00.40]But the bottles in the floor
[02:02.22]I'm to buzzed to clean them up
[02:04.49]Wish I could get a little undrunk
[02:10.13]So I could I could unlove you
[02:16.16]Wish I could get a little undrunk so I could uncall you
[02:19.44]At 5 in the morning I would unf**k you
[02:22.96]But some things you can't undo
[02:26.57]I wish I could unkiss the room full of strangers
[02:29.77]So I could unspite you unlose my temper
[02:33.29]But somethings you can't undo
[02:36.90]And one of them's
[02:37.63]You
[02:38.47]But can not can not
[02:41.14]Wish I could unlove you
[02:42.48]But can not can not
[02:44.97]But can not can not
[02:46.81]Wish I could unlove you
[02:47.72]But can not can not
[02:50.40]Can not
[02:51.43]Wish I could unf**k you
[02:53.24]You
[02:56.57]Wish I could unlove you
data.trans:
[ti:Undrunk (Explicit)]
[ar:FLETCHER]
[al:Undrunk (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.11]//
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.34]//
[00:00.46]希望我能清醒一点
[00:02.28]那样我就不会给你打电话了
[00:04.03]在早上五点 我也不会和你缠绵了
[00:09.52]说真的 派对结束了
[00:11.76]大家都应该回家了
[00:14.32]但我害怕清醒
[00:16.58]因为每次感到孤独 我做的第一件事就是
[00:19.16]看着你的照片自我催眠
[00:21.48]这些照片是你以前发给我的
[00:22.58]我本来应该删掉 但是悄悄地留了下来
[00:26.26]这样做是不是有点疯狂
[00:29.56]于是我往酒杯里挤了一点柠檬汁
[00:32.12]果汁刺痛了我手上的伤口
[00:34.09]但还是不如我想你时那样痛
[00:39.43]希望我能清醒一点 这样我就不会给你打电话了
[00:42.75]在早上五点 我也不会和你缠绵了
[00:46.16]但有些事情就是无法挽回
[00:49.93]我希望当初没有在陌生的人群中吻你
[00:53.01]这样我就不会恨你 不会发脾气
[00:56.48]但有些事情就是无法挽回
[01:00.17]在我心里 谁都不如你
[01:03.14]我害怕开灯
[01:05.96]我不想面对残酷的现实
[01:08.57]如果我来找你会不会很奇怪
[01:11.06]我想来 但我知道你身边已有新欢
[01:13.53]所以我看着你的照片自我催眠
[01:15.62]这些照片是你以前发给我的
[01:16.85]我本来应该删掉 但是悄悄地留了下来
[01:20.51]这样做是不是有点疯狂
[01:23.64]我很饿 面容憔悴 双手发抖
[01:26.41]我不该做饭的 还把热水溅出来烫着自己
[01:29.19]但还是不如我想你时那样痛
[01:33.59]希望我能清醒一点 这样我就不会给你打电话了
[01:36.95]在早上五点 我也不会和你缠绵了
[01:40.30]但有些事情就是无法挽回
[01:44.00]我希望当初没有在陌生的人群中吻你
[01:47.22]这样我就不会恨你 不会发脾气
[01:50.67]但有些事情就是无法挽回
[01:54.37]在我心里 谁都不如你
[01:55.58]百感交集
[01:57.78]此刻的我伤心欲绝
[02:00.40]酒瓶碎了一地
[02:02.22]我已经无力打扫
[02:04.49]希望我能清醒一点
[02:10.13]那样我就不会爱你了
[02:16.16]希望我能清醒一点 这样我就不会给你打电话了
[02:19.44]在早上五点 我也不会和你缠绵了
[02:22.96]但有些事情就是无法挽回
[02:26.57]我希望当初没有在陌生的人群中吻你
[02:29.77]这样我就不会恨你 不会发脾气
[02:33.29]但有些事情就是无法挽回
[02:36.90]你是我心里的唯一
[02:37.63]你
[02:38.47]但我做不到
[02:41.14]希望我不曾爱过你
[02:42.48]但我做不到
[02:44.97]但我做不到
[02:46.81]希望我不曾爱过你
[02:47.72]但我做不到
[02:50.40]做不到
[02:51.43]希望我不曾和你深情缠绵
[02:53.24]你
[02:56.57]希望我不曾爱过你
